column1: '''''English Studies''''' '''(December 1947)''' is an issue of the journal ''[http://www.tandf.co.uk/journals/nest English Studies]''. The 'Notes and News' section includes the essay "'iþþlen' in ''Sawles Warde''" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Simonne d'Ardenne
column2: S.R.T.O. d'Ardenne]] (see pp. 168-170). The essay discusses a corrupted or misread word in printed editions of an early manuscript of the [[Middle English]] homily ''[[Wikipedia:Sawles Warde
column4: C}}, p. 326</ref><ref name=TB>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=31500 English Studies 1947] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography] (accessed 27 April 2011)</ref>

column1: The essay was published separately as an offprint in paper wrappers in 1947, and the whole journal was reprinted in 1978.<ref name=TB/>
